subject: Basketball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. has declared that “bench decorum” will be a point of emphasis this season, which will likely affect Coach Jim Calhoun and many of the Big East’s other frenetic sideline presences.
snippet: The N.C.A.A. has declared that “bench decorum” will be a point of emphasis this season, which will likely affect Coach Jim Calhoun and many of the Big East’s other frenetic sideline presences.
